title: Govt grants Navratana status to power PSUs NHPC, SJVN
description: The government has granted 'Navratna' status to NHPC, SJVN, and SECI, enhancing their operational and financial autonomy. This recognition will support major investment plans and drive growth, significantly impacting the power sector and renewable energy initiatives in India. The decision reflects the achievements and potential of these public sector undertakings.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
